root:
CREATE CIEW achievement_reward_view AS SELECT A.entry,A.item,D.name_loc4 as itemname,A.sender,D.name_loc4 as sendername,B.subject_loc4,B.text_loc4 FROM achievement_reward A LEFT JOIN locales_achievement_reward B ON A.entry=B.entry LEFT JOIN locales_item C ON A.item=C.entry LEFT JOIN locales_creature D ON A.sender=D.entry
